column4: Hey, how come I can only get direct rendering when I run startx, and not when I log in through GDM?
Can someone help me with my direct rendering?
How come I can only get direct rendering by startin X with startx...and not the GDM....?
have you edited your xorg.conf file?
try pasting your xorg.conf file in a pastebin and post the link (scan it first to make sure there isn't any private data in it)
there is a line "XAANoOffScreenPixmaps" "false", is yours false or true?
i think the problem is that you are missing an option line under the device section
you do have an nvidia, correct?
it looks like you add the following lines  Option      "XAANoOffscreenPixmaps" "true" :: Option      "DRI"     "true"
to your xorg.conf file, under the device heading (where is says nvidia)
if i were you, i would just install beryl
you have a lot more than that missing from your xorg.conf file
google for beryl nvidia ubuntu xorg.conf and you will find some example xorg.conf files
